channel.title: Help with dieing and not losing items?
channel.description: Ok,well i'm working on adding a fully working duel arena to my server,i got the tele to duel arena down,and how to get into the arena,only problem is when you die you lose your items,anyone know a code that lets you keep your items,and also if you know a code i could use to let the people on my server stake.ANY help will be greatly appericated. :rolleyes:

item.title: Help with dieing and not losing items?
item.dc:creator: @jacobhankal jacobhankal
item.description:
@jacobhankal wrote:

i was watching this thread waiting for an awnser and i got one but if u remove the statment that makes u lose items on death, then you wont get drops in wilderness when your wanting to get drops will you?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with dieing and not losing items?

item.title: Help with dieing and not losing items?
item.dc:creator: @Evan1 Evan`
item.description:
@Evan1 wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:7, topic:196408”]Search for the death method, and then remove the statement that removes all items. I’m not going to tell you what that method is, that’s for you to figure out.[/quote]applyDead MOTHA FUCKER

Read full topic
